original_title: Murphy's Law: Up with Us, Down with Them
overview: This amplified collection of live performances filmed at New York City's Continental Club and Rex's in West Chester, Pa., shows why Murphy's Law has remained a staple of the hardcore rock scene for more than two decades. Tracks include "Don't Bother Me," "Cavity Creeps," "Secret Agent S.K.I.N.," "Quest for Herbs," "Wall of Death," "Skin Head Girl," "Vicky Crown," "Crucial Bar-B-Q," "What Will the Neighbors Think" and "Care Bear."
title: Murphy's Law: Up with Us, Down with Them
